item.description:
After some thought I decided to go ahead and publicize my photography exhibit through
the meet-up. I hope that this will encourage any group member who has an art, photography, mixed media, cd release or similar type of event they are hosting to advertise through the meet up group as well.

So here are the details:
Photography By Leia Masci
An intimate exhibit of edgy, provocative photos spanning from realism to illustration-
inspired by genres of graphic art, film noir and classic pin up. 18 and over only.

6-8pm
Part of the Arts Night Out Gallery Walk
Chilean wine and snacks

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Opening Reception for my first photography exhibit in Northampton tonight
